text: §3 The university, referred to in section 1, which during the suspension of lectures and other classes conducted classes using distance learning methods and techniques, may continue to conduct classes using these methods and techniques after the end of the suspension period of lectures and other classes, no longer however, than until September 30, 2020.

In the event of announcing an epidemic threat or state of an epidemic, the minister competent for health may change the dates referred to in paragraph 2.
5. In the case of repeated committing the same act, referred to in paragraph 1 or 2, the amount of the fine: 1) is not lower than the amount of the previous fine for such violation;

2.The provision of section 1 shall apply accordingly to the officers of the services mentioned in the provisions on pension provision for officers of the Police, the Internal Security Agency, the Intelligence Agency, the Military Counterintelligence Service, the Military Intelligence Service, Central Anticorruption Bureau, Border Guard, State Protection Service, State Fire Service, C Service elno-Skarbowa and the Prison Service and their families.

a) in sec. 1, the first sentence is replaced by the following: In the case of apprenticeships for students of technical secondary schools and post-secondary schools, planned to be carried out in the period in which the functioning of the education system units has been temporarily limited, these apprenticeships are carried out until the end of the 2019/2020 school year or in higher curricular classes (semesters).
